document_data.name: Luan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Luan''' was a news hawker who worked for the ''[[Baldur's Mouth]] Gazette'' in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''Um... Er... He - hello? Does - does anyone want to b-buy a gazette?''|Luan}}
document_data.Description: At the age of six, Luan was a pale-skinned [[human]] child with icy-blue eyes and hazel hair. The boy stuttered, was timid and very unsure of himself.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Luan could often be found peddling the ''Baldur's Mouth Gazette'' on the plaza outside of the [[Basilisk Gate]] in the Lower City.
